name: Happy Space
description:
In this game you are a rocketship, which is located somewhere in space, and has to find its way back to Earth. Meanwhile you also have to avoid the obscales such as other planets, satellites and asteriods.

The game contains 6 levels.

Controls

Cursor: Aim the rocket ship direction

Mouse1: Thrust

Escape: Go back to menu

Up- and downarrow: Turn volume up and down
